name: Color Keys
description:
Collect colorful keys and combine them to make it to the end in this puzzle-platformer game!

Use ESC or ENTER / RETURN to see your key ring. From there, click on two keys to combine them. for example, a red and a yellow key would combine to become orange. 

I recommend playing in fullscreen and using ENTER to combine keys for the best experience

This game was made for Mini Jam 62: Colors.
